basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Streptococcus mutans (EC50=1.39 µM), Streptococcus gordonii (EC50=2.43 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (EC50=1.61 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (EC50=4.41 µM), Porphyromonas gingivalis (EC50<1 µM).Fungi:Candida albicans (DIS) (EC50=5.85 µM), C. albicans (azole resistant) (EC50=2.40 µM), Candida glabrata (EC50=5.02 µM), C. glabrata (fluconazole resistant) (EC50=12.3 µM), Candida krusei (EC50=5.16 µM), Cryptococcus neoformans (EC50=4.05 µM), Cryptococcus neoformans (amphotericin B resistant) (EC50=4.29 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae (EC50=5.23 µM).
